meanings.definition: Capable of being reversed or undone.
meanings.sent1: The mistake was easily reversibles and corrected.
meanings.sent2: The decision to change the plan was reversibles at the last minute.
meanings.sent3: She found it funny how the puzzle was reversibles and then put back together.
meanings.sent4: His opinion on the matter was reversibles, shifting back and forth.
meanings.sent5: The magic trick made the rabbit disappear and then reappear, truly reversibles.

meanings.definition: Items of clothing that can be worn inside out or in different ways.
meanings.sent1: She loved her new reversibles jacket that could be worn two ways.
meanings.sent2: The store had a sale on reversibles, offering reversible shirts and pants.
meanings.sent3: He chuckled at the idea of wearing the reversibles sweater inside out for fun.
meanings.sent4: The fashion designer's collection featured unique reversibles for versatile looks.
meanings.sent5: The reversible scarf was a hit, allowing people to switch up their style easily.
